mapper.select: SELECT id, app_code, app_name, domain, auth_type, app_icon, login_bgp, sort, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, version FROM iam_app WHERE deleted = 0 AND app_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{appCode}, '%') AND app_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{appName}, '%') AND auth_type = #{authType} ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
